Text: How do you get the subtitles to work?
Skip6235 - Use VLC, and when playing the movie, right-click and go to "Video", then, "Subtitles Track" and click "Open File". Find the location of the subtitles, and choose the one you want.
I agree. Use vlc player or mplayer and just start the movie up and drag and drop the subs over the playing movie. Simple as pie.

A fantastic copy at this size!! 700MB, 2:00:14 long. Probably the best copy out there.

Original Mandarin language with perfectly synced both (!) srt and VobSub subtitles in English. I use WMP with CCCP codec pac - no issues. If i must rack down on anything - the volume is SLIGHTLY low.

A = 10
V = 10
